com.epoch

Class AppConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.AppConfig

  • public final class AppConfig
extends Object
    Configuration parameters used by ACE. Scope: created by the UI layer, passed on to all lower layers. Sessions: All. Note: Connection Pool can be embedded in this. Most values set upon login by Utils.java from configuration file stored in WEB-INF.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String allAppsRoot
      All apps root, what we call $BASE.
      static Standardizer allylDienylStdizer
      Standardizer for normalizing allyl- and dienyl-metal complexes.
      static String appRoot
      Root of file directory structure of this application.
      static String defaultDomain
      Email domain of the default institution, e.g., uky.edu.
      static String defaultInstitution
      Institution whose name should be selected in the registration pulldown menu.
      static String defaultInstitutionLdapUrls
      URLs needed to use LDAP at the default institution, comma-separated if more than one, e.g., ldap://ad.uky.edu,ldap://mc.uky.edu.
      static String defaultLanguage
      Default language of the institution.
      static String defaultUsernameLabel
      Name of the systemwide username/login ID of the default institution, e.g., linkBlue.
      static int EXAM_STUDENT_LIFE_WKS
      Lifetime (in weeks) of an exam login.
      static String jdbc_driverclass
      Will remain constant as long as Oracle's thin driver is used.
      static String marvinJSLicense
      License for MarvinJS.
      static String maximaProgram
      Maxima (mathematics) package.
      static String muttProgram
      Mutt (used to send email or text messages).
      static String nodeProgram
      Node (used to start Marvin Live) package.
      static boolean notEnglish
      Whether the default language is English.
      static String relFiguresDir
      Directory underneath the application root (relative path) that holds master-question figures.
      static String relTempDir
      Relative address of temp directory for import/export and for temporary storage of images.
      static String responseLogDir
      Directory where responses are logged.
      static Standardizer standardizer
      Standardizer for normalizing molecules such as ylides.
      static int tutorialId
      ID of course containing the tutorials and system notices.
      static String verifierEmail
      Email address of instructor verifier.
      static String verifierName
      Name of instructor verifier.
      static String webmasterEmail
      Email address of Webmaster.

    • Field Detail

      • jdbc_driverclass

        public static final String jdbc_driverclass
        Will remain constant as long as Oracle's thin driver is used. Used in db/QSetRW. Value also found in $CATALINA_BASE/conf/context.xml.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • appRoot

        public static String appRoot
        Root of file directory structure of this application. Needed for writing of tempfiles, such as pictures of molecules and imported files. Used in Question.java, db/QuestionWrite.java, db/QuestionRead.java, and session/QSet.java. Also used in db/HWRead.java but just in a call to QuestionRead. Set eventually by courseware/servlets/LoginServlet.java.

      • allAppsRoot

        public static String allAppsRoot
        All apps root, what we call $BASE.

      • relFiguresDir

        public static String relFiguresDir
        Directory underneath the application root (relative path) that holds master-question figures. Locally authored question figures are held in user_relFiguresDir.

      • relTempDir

        public static String relTempDir
        Relative address of temp directory for import/export and for temporary storage of images.

      • responseLogDir

        public static String responseLogDir
        Directory where responses are logged. Used in db/ResponseLogger only.

      • maximaProgram

        public static String maximaProgram
        Maxima (mathematics) package.

      • muttProgram

        public static String muttProgram
        Mutt (used to send email or text messages).

      • nodeProgram

        public static String nodeProgram
        Node (used to start Marvin Live) package.

      • marvinJSLicense

        public static String marvinJSLicense
        License for MarvinJS.

      • standardizer

        public static Standardizer standardizer
        Standardizer for normalizing molecules such as ylides.

      • allylDienylStdizer

        public static Standardizer allylDienylStdizer
        Standardizer for normalizing allyl- and dienyl-metal complexes.

      • webmasterEmail

        public static String webmasterEmail
        Email address of Webmaster.

      • tutorialId

        public static int tutorialId
        ID of course containing the tutorials and system notices.

        public static final int EXAM_STUDENT_LIFE_WKS
        Lifetime (in weeks) of an exam login.
